name: A way out (itch) (Chanson)
description:
After getting off work, a normal person was waiting to cross the road to go home. But he was accidentally hit by a car, and then traveled to another world. He wandered back and forth in the maze, trying to find the exit cave, but found himself struggling in an infinite loop.

Controls

Move with 'WASD' 

Use space to jump 

Control the camera by mouse

Features

  • Maze escape game for PC and Mac
  • low-poly art style
  • 3 different levels by generating different mazes each time
  • Open-source music by Ujico*/Snail's House

This is a student project for INFSCI1470 at the University of Pittsburgh
